notesStmt.note: A translation, by James Martin, of part 3 of: Saravia, Adrien. De diversis ministrorum evangelii gradibus.
"An appendix to Sarauia, ansvvering fovre maine arguments which vsurpers of the churches right vsually alledge" has separate dated title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
